unnormalised: Boro, mhonnge konnen tor soddle, "Tumchem atam meren pollelam soglleant vegllem address kitem?" Bhai, mhaka sangonk di Bangalore-ant Priya Sharma-chem zago sodunk voirsor mhaka kitem zaalem. Eke Bollywood comedy-ntlean sarke ek adventure aslem tem.
normalised: Borem, konnem tor sod'dich proxn kelo, "Tuminn polloilelem soglleant vichitr addresso kitem?" Bhai, mhaka sang Priyo Sharma-chem Bangalore-ant zago sodunk voirsor bhoglo to onnbhov. Eka Bollywood-che komeddi-ntleo koxe advencher toxem bhoglo.

unnormalised: Address, tinnem text kellem te porim, "Thoddea vhoddlea vonnachea zhaddachea samkar, pornea deullant lagim, CCD-chea fattim, thoddem nillea daravontant lagim, #420, 1-vo maallo, Thindlu, Bangalore, 560097." CCD? Kitem? Bangalore-ant auto-rickshaw-nk meter astaat title poros Coffee Day outlets chodd aassat! Ani "thoddem lagim" mhonnge exact GPS-friendly nhui.
normalised: Ti texted kel'lo address, "Vhodd vortichea rukhak vireudh, pornea devllak laggi, C-C-D-chea fattim, nillea darak kitem xorti, hash char xem vis, poilo mazlo, Thindlu, Bangalore, panch so xonnoi xunya navoy sat." C-C-D? Konnchem tem?! Bangalore-ant auto-rickshaw-chea meter-chea odhik Coffee Day-chea outlets asat! Ani "kitem xorti" exact-ponnim G-P-S-friendly na.

unnormalised: Mhonnun, hanv Thindlu-nt ghumvtam, jem kiteak tor eke xharant pirngollellea gavant bhasoita. Poile, mhaka ek vonnachem zhadd mellta, punn temka lagim *teen* deulla aassat. Hanv eka chaiwala-ka sodtam. To mhonta, "Oh, tem zhadd? Sidha voch, mithai-chea dukanaan ek daavem ghe, ani punha sodo." Classic Indian dikhvani.
normalised: Dekhun, Thindlu-nt hanv driving korun bhovton, kiteak mhaka ek ganv xeran gollunk dita mhonn dislem. Poilem, mhaka ek vorticho rukh mell'lo, punn tin devllam tenka laggi aslli. Hanv eka chaiwala-k vicharlem. Tannem mhaka sang, "Oh, to rukh? Sid'dhe voch, mithai-che dukhan dhave vatten, ani magir vichar." Klasik Bharotiche directions.

unnormalised: Sumar 45 minute pori vhondul korun ani vaddonk laglelea hangry-nk mellun, mhaka nimannem ek nillem daaravont dislem. Ani poryatnank dislem mhonnge, ek number 420! Kitem zaalem, tem tecnically "#420/A" aslem, punn konn hisob kortaa, baro? 1-vo maallo, mhonnge kiteak tor kitleak tor rickety nhinna vaddhouchea te 1947-chean pass korun pollelea nhui. Punn hey, Priya-che chai atle tori mhalle porim asle... kiteaak tori.
normalised: Sumar cholli ponch minto bhovton ani khup rag ailo, mhaka nimannek nillem dar dislem. Ani pollo, nombor char xem vis! To technical-ponnim "hash char xem vis slash A" aslem punn konn count kortolo, kiteak? Poilo mazlo, khoim sumari rickety stern voirddunk poddlo jem ek hozar ponch xem cholli sat voir polloinn'ni kel'lele na. Punn hey, Priya-chea chai te hantle khatir bhogsonneachem aslem... zaunk xekta.
